issue.title: FCD Ballot Comment US-135
issue.discussion: This paragraph says: Let bk = xmin+k·δ for k = 0,...,n, and wk = fw(bk +δ) for k = 0,...,n. However I believe that fw(bk) would be far more desirable. I strongly suspect that this is nothing but a type-o.
issue.resolution:
Change p10 to read:
Let bk = xmin+k·δ for k = 0,...,n, and wk = fw(bk) for k = 0,...,n.
